name: Wish upon a star
description:
"Wish upon a star" it's a mini rogue-like game where you control a little cute star on his journey to the closest planet. 
It is a quiet dark environment where  your  visibility will depends on your star energy more you have more you can see.
Avoid enemies,  break asteroids and last as long you can on the deep space.

This video game was developed for my first game jam , Weekly Game Jam # 135

Enjoy and feel free leaving me a comment or a suggestion! :D
